meanings.definition: The practice or condition of having more than one husband at one time.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, polyandry is accepted as a way to share responsibilities among husbands.
meanings.sent2: Polyandry was a common practice in ancient societies where women married multiple men.
meanings.sent3: The idea of polyandry can lead to humorous misunderstandings in romantic comedies.
meanings.sent4: To some, polyandry may seem like trying to juggle too many partners at once.
meanings.sent5: The concept of polyandry can be complex but fascinating to study.

meanings.definition: The state or relationship of having multiple husbands simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: Polyandry challenges traditional notions of marriage by involving multiple husbands.
meanings.sent2: In polyandry, all husbands share equal responsibilities towards the family.
meanings.sent3: The sitcom portrayed a comical scenario where polyandry caused confusion among the characters.
meanings.sent4: Polyandry can be seen as a unique bond that ties multiple husbands together.
meanings.sent5: The novel depicted a society where polyandry was the norm, creating intriguing dynamics among the characters.
